aboutUsDescription: Forget about any other Korean travel agencies so far! Do you go on a travel to be happy? Then you made a right choice. Make a choice if you’re ready to be happy. We Adel tour can make your dream come true. A leisurely trip, not a time-consuming one. A journey that captivates customers with emotion, not merchandise. A vacation with No shopping, No option without any pressure. We made a challenge for that vacation.

refund_line1: 1. 100% refund of all travel expenses if it’s cancelled 30 days before departure
refund_line2: 2. 50% refund of all travel expenses if it’s cancelled 2 weeks before departure
refund_line3: 3. 30% refund of all travel expenses if it’s cancelled one day before departure
refund_line4: 4. 10% refund of all travel expenses upon it’s cancellation on the day of departure

noRefund_footer: Any single parts of the tour itinerary which are voluntarily skipped when tour is in progress, (for instance, admission tickets, meals or show) are not refundable. a Any extra costs by changing your programs are at your own expense.
